charges.charge_description: 18:113C.F ASSAULT WITHIN MARITIME AND/OR TERRITORIAL JURISDICTION (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Dft pleaded guilty to Count I of the Indictment. SENTENCE: Dft committed to BOP for a term of 26 mos; upon rlse, dft shall be on supervised rlse for a term of 36 mos; Special conditions of supervision imposed; VAF $100 AMENDED JUDGMENT ON REVOCATION OF SUPERVISED RELEASE: dft committed to custody of BOP for 26 mos w/credit for time served which includes 8 mos on the Tribal Court charges. This takes the total term of imprisonment from 34 to 26 mos. Upon rlse, dft to be placed on supervised rlse for 36 mos. $100 VAF (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Dft pleaded guilty to Count I of the Indictment. SENTENCE: Dft committed to BOP for a term of 26 mos; upon rlse, dft shall be on supervised rlse for a term of 36 mos; Special conditions of supervision imposed; VAF $100 (2)
